Title: Repeals the requirement that any person, firm or corporation that sells or offers for sale at retail any motor fuel for use in internal combustion engines in motor vehicles or motorboats posts certain signage
Summary: Repeals the requirement that any person, firm or corporation that sells or offers for sale at retail any motor fuel for use in internal combustion engines in motor vehicles or motorboats posts on the dispensing device signage stating the price per gallon of such motor fuel.
LawCode: Rpld ยง192 sub 5, amd ยง192, Ag & Mkts L; amd ยง20-672, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making conforming technical changes; and to repeal subdivision 5 of section 192 of the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the requirement that any person, firm or corporation that sells or offers for sale at retail any motor fuel for use in internal combustion engines in motor vehicles or motorboats posts on the dispensing device signage stating the price per gallon of such motor fuel
